# Contributing

Thank you for your interest in contributing to LLM Council!

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) for detailed guidelines including:

- Development setup
- Coding standards
- Pull request process
- Commit message format
- Testing requirements

## Quick Links

- [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [Security Policy](https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council/blob/master/SECURITY.md)
- [Support Channels](https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council/blob/master/SUPPORT.md)
- [Governance](https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council/blob/master/GOVERNANCE.md)

## Development Setup

```bash
# Clone and install
git clone https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council.git
cd llm-council
make setup

# Run tests
make test

# Run linting
make lint
```
